remarks: Join of equivalence classes under the fineness relation-part two. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 8-Oct-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2015.)
statement:
fnejoin2 $p |- ( ( X e. V /\ A. y e. S X = U. y ) -> ( if ( S = (/) , { X } , U. S ) Fne T <-> ( X = U. T /\ A. x e. S x Fne T ) ) ) $.
$d S x y $.
$d T x $.
$d V x $.
$d X x y $.
